about_the_game:
Is Murder Miners one of your favorite $1 games that you’ve gotten 10’s or even 100’s of hours from? Are you a believer in JForce? Well here is a great way to show off your belief while supporting the development of Murder Miners X.

This DLC includes 4 items:

  1. Believer Badge!

  2. Gold weapon skins! Everything a believer touches turns to gold...every weapon you equip will become golden with belief and every golden weapon you drop will revert back to normal if touched by a nonbeliever (this effect can be toggled in armor customization).


  3. Glowing believer banner in pregame lobby!


  4. Spit on nonbelievers ability! Shame the unwashed, non-believing masses who do not kno de wae (with related achievement). To spit press "Z" on the keyboard (or X + Right on the D-pad with an Xbox controller) then fire it at the nonbelievers.
